FuncDef:
The fips-mode enable command enables the FIPS mode.
The undo fips-mode enable command disables the FIPS mode. The fips-mode enable command enables the FIPS mode. The undo fips-mode enable command disables the FIPS mode. By default, the FIPS mode is disabled.
Examples: Warning: Changing the FIPS mode will clear the configuration file used for next startup and restart the device. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: You can run the fips-mode enable command to enable the FIPS mode. In this mode, the algorithms used by cryptographic modules must comply with FIPS to ensure that cryptographic modules are running properly.
